arStrings.szText:
{icon:bullet}Enemies routinely drop additional {c_materials}Artificer's Stones{/c} and occasionally drop {c_boss_summon_mats}Boss Summoning Items{/c} or {c_pickups}Infernal Compasses{/c}.
{icon:bullet}Kills accumulate Reputation with the {c_yellow}Zakarum Remnants{/c}.
{icon:bullet}You gain {c_number}15%{/c} increased Experience.
